root.name: Chase: Hollywood Stunt Driver
root.description: GameplayThe game takes places over multiple action scenes in four movies:The Unchaseables - a prohibition era gangster filmChase of the Triad IV - an asian gangster flickChasing Survival - a post-apocalyptic filmThe Spy Who Chased Me - a James Bond-style spy filmTo complete a scene Chase has to reach the end of the course before film runs out. Along the way she has to achieve certain shots, like crashing through boxes, powersliding through a turn, or overtaking a train, in order to earn reputation points that unlock new scenes.Hidden in each scene is a trophy that will unlock multiplayer challenges like bus jumping and tricking. Once a scene has been completed its vehicle can be used in the multiplayer modes.
